title: Understanding the Melancholic Type in Traditional Greek Medicine
first_phrase: In this text, we explore the concept of "Melancholic" in the traditional Greek medicine classification, which is linked to weak physique and a secluded way of being. This type is associated with the thyroid gland and has the illusion of separation. The text explains how this state of mind can preclude genuine relationships and can make us lose contact with our body. It also touches upon the development of a person with a dry temperament and how they can learn to retain life energy. The text ends with an interpretation of the traditional symbol of earth being linked to this way of being.

last_phrase: In order to live in the present as a "terra" type, it is recommended to develop inner silence and learn the art of mental silence. Quieting the mind and embracing silence can help one to detach from programmed thinking, cultivate emotional awareness, and live more fully in the present moment.
